example.text: Pres. Biden gambled that House Republicans couldn’t come up with a plan. They did. If Pres. Biden doesn’t negotiate now in good faith, he’ll be responsible for America defaulting on its debt—which would be catastrophic. [[url]]

If Germany wants to be a leader in Europe--and, gosh, I hope they do--it needs to lead. That starts with footing the bill for its own defense--we are willing to share that burden, but the American people can't do it alone--and it starts with helping Ukraine.
I am grateful to see that this $12.7 million will go towards disaster recovery efforts in Slidell and Jefferson Parish as well as to repairing the grid. [[url]]
Americans notice the rising price of eggs, and they don’t think their 401(k)’s are crashing because the Biden economy is just "so good." Pres. Biden’s inflation is gutting them like a fish. [[url]]

Fentanyl is stealing the lives of thousands of Americans—and it’s being trafficked in from Mexico. If Pres. Biden was serious about getting drugs off our streets, he’d secure our southern border. #BorderCrisis #Title42 [[url]]

Louisiana has seen fentanyl's carnage. I wrote a bill to get fentanyl dealers out of our communities, and Senate Democrats just blocked it from passing. Today is National Fentanyl Awareness Day. [[url]]
